mapper.select: SELECT r.NO AS no, r.U_ID AS u_id, r.P_ID AS p_id, r.R_REVIEW AS r_review, r.R_DATE AS r_date, r.rating, ri.RE_NO AS re_no, ri.R_IMAGE_NAME AS r_image_name, ri.R_IMAGE AS r_image FROM REVIEW r LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE ri ON ri.RE_NO = r.NO WHERE r.P_ID = #{pId} ORDER BY r.R_DATE desc

SELECT r.NO AS no, r.U_ID AS u_id, r.P_ID AS p_id, r.R_REVIEW AS r_review, r.R_DATE AS r_date, p.name AS name, ri.RE_NO AS re_no, ri.R_IMAGE_NAME AS r_image_name, ri.R_IMAGE AS r_image FROM REVIEW r LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE ri ON ri.RE_NO = r.NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT p ON r.P_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY r.R_DATE desc
